MFE Financial Econometrics I¶

The Michaelmas term and Hilary term course websites contain all of the Financial Econometrics I and II material.

Notes¶

The complete set of notes covers all aspects of the Financial Econometrics I and II courses.

Computation¶

Python¶

The introduction course and companion course are designed to accompany Financial Econometrics I and II and to provide tools needed in Empirical Asset pricing. This course is substantially self-supported.

Archive¶

Older courses that are not currently offered.

Advanced Financial Econometrics: Forecasting (2020)¶

The course website for Advanced Financial Econometrics: Forecasting contains all material distributed in Trinity Term 2020.
